operatorDefinitions.concreteContent:
Init == (* Global variables *)
        /\ x = [i \in 0..(N-1) |-> 0]
        /\ y = [i \in 0..(N-1) |-> 0]
        /\ pc = [self \in ProcSet |-> "a"]
operatorDefinitions.location: line 44, col 1 to line 47, col 42 of module Simple

operatorDefinitions.concreteContent:
a(self) == /\ pc[self] = "a"
           /\ x' = [x EXCEPT ![self] = 1]
           /\ pc' = [pc EXCEPT ![self] = "b"]
           /\ y' = y
operatorDefinitions.location: line 49, col 1 to line 52, col 20 of module Simple

operatorDefinitions.concreteContent:
b(self) == /\ pc[self] = "b"
           /\ y' = [y EXCEPT ![self] = x[(self-1) % N]]
           /\ pc' = [pc EXCEPT ![self] = "Done"]
           /\ x' = x

Terminating == /\ \A self \in ProcSet: pc[self] = "Done"
               /\ UNCHANGED vars
